# Expedited Spellcasting
## Overview
**Expedited Spellcasting**

You can cast spells requiring lengthy preparations in less time.

**Benefit:** You can cast spells with a casting time greater than 1 round in half the normal time.

**Source:** Ultimate Options: New Arcane Discoveries (Super Genius Games), pg. 3
